thread.title: Martin Odegaard must play for loan club Heerenveen every week - or Dutch side must PAY Real Madrid
thread.title_full: Martin Odegaard must play for loan club Heerenveen every week - or Dutch side must PAY Real Madrid

author: Alex Richards
title: Martin Odegaard must play for loan club Heerenveen every week - or Dutch side must PAY Real Madrid
text:
10 of the brightest European youngsters turning Premier League heads 
Yet there have also been other claims that Streppel isn’t actually completely taken with the ex-Stromsgodset youngster but has had to play him out of a sense of duty. 
Now, according to El Confidencial, it is more than that. They suggest that Odegaard must feature, even if only for one minute (as he did on his debut), or the Dutch side must pay Los Blancos a fee of €40,000. 
So far, they are fulfilling their obligations. Odegaard making his debut against ADO Den Haag (Photo: 2017 Getty Images) 
Odegaard has yet to score in his seven games, but registered his first assist in the 3-0 win over Roda JC at the weekend. 
Los Blancos agreed to the 18-month loan deal because they’re aware that Odegaard needs regular game time to progress. 
From their point of view, such a move is a smart one and is not completely uncommon. 
For Heerenveen, it could well prove a costly affair - both on and off the pitch - should things go south. poll loading Will Martin Odegaard become a Real Madrid star one day? 5000+ VOTES SO FAR
